# uptimekuma_notification_mattermost (Data Source)

Get Mattermost notification information by ID or name

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "uptimekuma_notification_mattermost" "example" {
  name = "Mattermost Example"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
- `name` (String) Notification name
